com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model
Class CxServerConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model.CxServerConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITooltipable
public class CxServerConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITooltipable

CxServerConfiguration is the class for server configuration. A server configuration is the association of a CodeX server and an authentification (user/password). This allows you to manage several connexions to several CodeX servers with different users.

Nested Class Summary
static interface CxServerConfiguration.RetrievePasswordHook
          Hook to retrieve password when it isn't filled by user.

isConfigurationComplete

public boolean isConfigurationComplete()
Returns true if the configuration is complete, false otherwise. Required attributes for a configuration are
  • name
  • url
  • username
Password is not required (because user may not want his password to be stored) and will be asked further

Returns:
true if configuration is complete (don't check password).

hasPassword

public boolean hasPassword()
Returns true is the configuration has a password, false otherwise

Returns:
true if the configuration has a password, false otherwise

isConnected

public boolean isConnected()
Returns true if the configuration has an active connection to the server, false otherwise

Returns:
true if the configuration has an active connection to the server, false otherwise

getServer

public CxServer getServer()
                   throws CxException
Returns the server of this configuration. This method init the connexion if necessary

Returns:
server (init connection if necessary).
Throws:
CxLoginException
CxException

getServer

public CxServer getServer(CxServerConfiguration.RetrievePasswordHook passwordHook)
                   throws CxException
Returns the server. If it doesn't exist, creates it and intializes it:
  • from the sessionHash if furnished OR
  • by loggin with user/password

Parameters:
passwordHook - used if password is not provided by user (if password AND hook are null/empty, this method try to open connection with a blank password).
Returns:
server (init connection if necessary).
Throws:
CxLoginException
CxException

logout

public void logout()
Close the connexion to the server of this configuration
